name: Outnumbered
description:
Outnumbered is a game about destruction and battles against large armies. Survive, adapt and evolve your ship to dominate the battlefield. Be warned: Skill is required to survive and to avoid starting to cry (Neither a Pay2Win nor Click2Win game).

The game is currently in Beta (V0.2.0, ongoing game balancing) with the following features:

Game Features

  • Choose out of countless Weapon, Defense and Enhancement Systems (Deck-Building and Credits System)
  • Top-Down Rogue-Lite Shooter Action
  • Destroy hordes of enemies and bosses
  • Ship Configuration
  • Available Game Modes: Time Survival
  • Randomization to create unique playthrough experiences
  • More explosions than in a Michael Bay movie!
